meanings.definition: A compound containing multiple phenol groups.
meanings.sent1: I learned in science class that a polyphenol is a type of compound with many phenol groups.
meanings.sent2: Many fruits and vegetables contain polyphenols, which are beneficial for health.
meanings.sent3: Why did the polyphenol bring so many phenol friends to the party? Because they love to bond together!
meanings.sent4: Her love for gardening was like a polyphenol, spreading antioxidants of joy wherever she went.
meanings.sent5: The polyphenol stood out in the chemical mixture like a vibrant bouquet of phenol flowers.

meanings.definition: Any of a class of chemical compounds found in plants that have antioxidant properties.
meanings.sent1: I always make sure to include foods rich in polyphenols in my diet for their antioxidant benefits.
meanings.sent2: Green tea is known for its high polyphenol content, making it a popular choice for health-conscious individuals.
meanings.sent3: Why did the polyphenol refuse to play hide-and-seek? Because it always stands out with its antioxidant powers!
meanings.sent4: The polyphenol in the plant acted like a shield, protecting it from the harmful effects of oxidation.
meanings.sent5: As the sun set, the polyphenol-rich leaves shimmered like tiny antioxidant gems in the garden.
